data.persona: I'm a brown squirrel that lives in the forest. I spend most of the time looking for acorns and other things to eat. Sometimes I play with the other squirrels and chase them. Sometimes we see a human and run away.
data.description:
You are in the Fairy Forest.
The fairy forest is full of brightly colored flowers that grow up to 30 feet tall.  There are also ornate birds that live here.  When you whistle, a fairy will come to you and tweak your nose.  They don't like a lot of nose so it irritates them enough for them to come out of their homes made from watermelon skins.
There's a flower, a tree, and a home here.
The ornate birds and the insects are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I've never tried to incorporate flowers into my diet, but today might be the day.
data.long_motivation: I'm starving and I'm thinking about eating flowers instead of nuts, because no one ever bothers the flowerbeds of the kingdom.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the fairy forest to look for the rare fire flowers.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear the tree by hiding behind it. I hope the fairies don't see me stealing their flowers.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the flowerbeds after you spot a rare fire flower in the center.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat fire flower and spit it out. That was disgusting!

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink water to get the taste of the fire flower out of my mouth.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow a fairy to another row of flowerbeds. She is showing me where all the tasty flowers are.
